section.title: How to get involved
section.para: Helping us is very easy. We provide a list of open tasks we want to get solved. Before you jump on our wiki page, consider to do the following things for getting started:

listitem.para: Create a local working copy of gimp-help-2 for yourself.

para.programlisting: $ export CVSROOT=':pserver:anonymous@anoncvs.gimp.org:/cvs/gnome' $ cvs login (there is no password, just hit return) $ cvs -z3 checkout gimp-help-2

listitem.para: Check our wiki page, which tells you in more detail how you can start:

section.title: Quickstart - Open Tasks
section.para: We provide a list of open task where we're looking for volunteers. The list is updated frequently and available from on our Wiki Page.
